Steady, Gins rail I always liked to stop him before he got the word

And what about Martin Van Buren?
Martin Van Buren, poor man, I pitied him* He never fairly got over
an accident he met with at the Castle Garden Bridge, when it broke
down, and he had to seise hold of the tail of the Ginera!8s horse to
keep his head above water*
